column2: title=The Precincts of Felicity: The Augustinian City of the Oxford Christians

column1: '''''The Precincts of Felicity: The Augustinian City of the Oxford Christians''''' is a book which compares the works of the inklings from a theological perspective.

column2: An Analysis of the Oxford Christians, Charles Williams, C.S. Lewis, J.R.R. Tolkien, and by extension, T.S. Eliot, and Dorothy Sayers- as they relate to the image of St. Augustine's City of God. An interesting analysis of a fertile literary group}}

column1: {{DEFAULTSORT:Precincts of Felicity: The Augustinian City of the Oxford Christians}}
